page.title: 20What I Enjoyed.
page.content: My name is Karen Beevers. I have helped with the typing of this project. Last Summer term I was a third year pupil in{Mr Little's } class. I took part in all the trips and visits and enjoyed them all a great deal. I thought the most interesting of these talks was the talk and visit by Commander Gammon, though the most fun was gathered from the trip with Mr Breeds on Braunton Burrows. I have learnt a lot and also because I have been involved with the computer, I now feel quite at home with disks, the keyboard etc.
